General.Name: WiseChip Semiconductor
General.Description: WiseChip Semiconductor Inc. engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, and marketing of organic light emitting diodes (OLEDs) in Taiwan. Its principal products include OLED, full color, wide temperature range, character, and monochrome/area color displays; and bendable OLEDs, transparent OLEDs, matrix OLEDs, touch and round OLEDs, etc. that are used in consumer, PC peripheral, industrial, medical, automotive, and communication applications. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Chu-nan, Taiwan.

4.Name: Guo Hui  Lin
4.Title: VP of Management Department and Director
